channel.title: GrowthChain | Blockchain, Crypto and NFT Marketing

item.title: Case Study: NMKR PR and Consulting
item.description: Elevating NMKR: Cardano's prime NFT minters. Strategic consultation & PR excellence paved the way for growth.

item.title: Case Study: Supercolony's WASM Conference
item.description: We helped Supercolony grow attendance for their WASM Conference through social media advertising and landing page optimization. The conference had 2,500+ attendees and aimed to empower entrepreneurs and accelerate growth within the Polkadot ecosystem.

item.title: Crypto Legends and Bliss NFTs: A Project Case Study - NYM Studio
item.description: NYM Studio partnered with GrowthChain, an NFT marketing agency, to develop their social media presence, growing their Twitter from under 2,000 to over 9,000 followers and aiding in the growth of their Discord server. With the help of GrowthChain, NYM Studio successfully sold out their NFT sale, each priced at 0.09 ETH ($160).

item.title: Case Study: Choise.com's $1,000,000+ NTO
item.description: Partnering with Choise for their NFT Token Offering was a success! Through strategic influencer collaborations, they raised $1M+ for their crypto wallet, solidifying their crypto industry presence.

item.title: Case Study: Building a Community for the Carrot App
item.description: We successfully grew the Carrot social media application from zero users to their first users by building up their social platforms and discord server, while using artwork from Polygon artists to establish trust and authority. Through giving a rewards system we built on Discord, we created an active and engaged community with no ad spend or promotions.

item.title: Case Study: Laugh Out Labs
item.description: Grew Laugh Out Labs from zero to 8,000 Twitter followers in 1.5 months, uniting comedy and NFT enthusiasts. Thriving community and massive engagement with millions of impressions.

item.title: Case Study: Wolves of Rome Sell 2000 NFTs in 32 Hours
item.description: NFT game Wolves of Rome sought to onboard influencers for their genesis NFT drop. Our influencer outreach strategy focused on engaging with content creators in the Cardano community. The campaign resulted in 2000 NFTs sold out in 32 hours, raising 300.6k ADA in mint sales.
